Posts.Content: beachgirl501 wrote: I was diagnosed the last week in October 2013.  It has been a very long process with many delays due to scans and more scans and holidays.  I will be starting chemo therapy prior to my bilateral mastectomy.  I will be receiving a new drug Perjeta along with Taxotere, Charboplatin, and Herceptin for HER2 positive.  Anyone else planning/talking about these drugs? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Starting TCH/Perjeta in January 2014 beachgirl501 beachgirl501
